# A demo of markdown Let's display some markdown in `React` ## Elements * This is a list * The second line of the list * *This line should be in italic* üëè ### GitHub flavored markdown (GFM) **Let's try a table** | Elements | Tag | | ------------: | :------------------ | | Table row | tr | | Data cell | td | ~~strikethrough~~ * [ ] task list * [x] checked item https://example.com #### code block ```jsx /* This is a comment */ import React from 'react' // render jsx elements onto the DOM ReactDOM.render(
Hello world
, document.querySelector('#content') ) ``` > built with [react](https://reactjs.org/)
